description:
Do you already know the basics of Office 2010?

Then now’s the time to learn valuable tips & tricks that will expand your knowledge and save you time with this one-of-a-kind video training course. Office 2010 is a complete suite of software productivity tools from Microsoft and includes Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook.

With this video course, you can take advantage of expertly curated tips to help take your skills to a new level. Our instructors provide expert, straight-forward, user-friendly training to help you enhance your Office 2010 knowledge the way you want to learn.

This course includes more than 50 two-four- minute lessons that will quickly help you discover workspace shortcuts, cool productivity tips, and optimization tricks.

If you’re looking for real-world Office 2010 instruction, you’ll find it here.
title: Office 2010 Quick Tips
